Header: “Five Fingers for Marseilles” will be released this month
Content: “Five Fingers for Marseilles” is a 2017 South African Western thriller film directed by Michael Matthews. The film stars Vuyo Dabula as Tau, Zethu Dlomo as Lerato, Hamilton Dhlamini as Sepoko, Kenneth Nkosi as Bongani and Mduduzi Mabaso as Luyanda. He residents of the colonial town of Marseilles are under the thumb of police oppression and only the young rebels known as the Five Fingers are willing to stand up to them. Their battle is just, until Tau kills two policemen and flees the scene. The movie will be released on 7th of this month.
